title: Gadgets Roundup: Compact Cameras Make a Comeback
summary: Phone fatigue pushes creators to pocketable shooters with big sensors.
author: Hybiz Desk
content: Manufacturers are focusing on ergonomics, dedicated controls and long battery life. title: Market Outlook 2025: Tech Leads the Rebound
summary: Analysts see enterprise AI and semiconductors driving growth next year.
author: Hybiz Desk
content: Software and chips are expected to outperform broader indices as spending shifts to automation. CIO surveys point to sustained cloud optimization and GenAI pilots moving into production.

title: City Hosts Hybiz Street Food Fest
summary: Pop-ups from 40 homegrown brands bring new flavors downtown.
author: Hybiz Desk
content: From regional thalis to vegan bowls, the curation focused on fresh, local ingredients. Visitors also attended quick fire talks by chefs on sustainable cooking.

title: A 7-Minute Morning Wellness Routine That Sticks
summary: Breathwork, mobility and sunlight can reset your day.
author: Hybiz Desk
content: Experts suggest pairing short routines with habit cues like brewing coffee. Keep movements gentle and repeatable.
